info.author: Martin Brochhaus
info.description:
Django Roadmap
==============

A reusable Django app to store and display a set of goals for the future.


Installation
------------

Prerequisites:

* Django
* django-cms (cms 3 tested)
* django-hvad

If you want to install the latest stable release from PyPi::

    $ pip install django-roadmap

If you feel adventurous and want to install the latest commit from GitHub::

    $ pip install -e git://github.com/bitmazk/django-roadmap.git#egg=roadmap

Add ``roadmap`` to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...,
        'roadmap',
    )

Run the South migrations::

    ./manage.py migrate roadmap


Usage
-----

TODO: Describe usage


Roadmap
-------

Check the issue tracker on github for milestones and features to come.
info.name: django-roadmap
info.summary: A simple app to display a project roadmap with milestones and events.
info.html_description:
A reusable Django app to store and display a set of goals for the future.

Installation

Prerequisites:

  • Django
  • django-cms (cms 3 tested)
  • django-hvad

If you want to install the latest stable release from PyPi:

$ pip install django-roadmap

If you feel adventurous and want to install the latest commit from GitHub:

$ pip install -e git://github.com/bitmazk/django-roadmap.git#egg=roadmap

Add roadmap to your INSTALLED_APPS:

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...,
    'roadmap',
)

Run the South migrations:

./manage.py migrate roadmap
